DOC.detailed_description: Chronic sinusitis HIV-infected individual recurrent persistent infection potentially serious complication : exacerbate pulmonary disease , cause recurrence life-threatening sepsis , progress central nervous system involvement . Symptoms sinusitis HIV patient often refractory aggressive Western medical management , antibiotic intolerance occur . Traditional Chinese Medicine consist acupuncture herbal treatment may provide low-risk , low-cost alternative conventional antibiotic therapy . Patients randomize receive either Traditional Chinese Medicine ( acupuncture herbal treatment ) conventional antibiotic therapy ( Sudafed Augmentin ) . Treatment continue 8 week , follow 4 week washout , final follow-up week 12 . Patients must undergo endoscopic nasal exam CT scan paranasal sinus prior study entry week 12 .
